_panels.title: chronicle disk operations taking over 1 second
chronicle disk operations per second
_panels.description:
Number of chronicle disk operations per second by type.
Computed as: `irate(cm_chronicle_disk_latency_seconds_count[5m])`

_panels.title: average chronicle sync latency (ms)
_panels.description:
Average chronicle fsync latency (i.e. total time waiting for fsyncs
divided by the number of fsyncs in the period. Computed as: `1000 * irate(cm_chronicle_disk_latency_seconds_sum{op="sync"}[5m]) /
ignoring(name) irate(cm_chronicle_disk_latency_seconds_count{op="sync"}[5m])`

_panels.title: number of chronicle appends / s
_panels.description:
Number of chronicle appends performed per second. Computed as:
`irate(cm_chronicle_append_num_total[5m])`

_panels.title: maximum number of appends batched at the storage over 1 minute
